articles.title: PBC eyes SEA Games gold — Bong Coo - BusinessWorld Online
articles.description: INSPIRED by its bronze medal performance in the World Championships in Dubai, the Philippine bowling team has trained its sights at claiming its first Southeast Asian (SEA) Games gold medal in over a decade in the Hanoi tilt in May next year.
